## Problem 2

```{r}

set.seed(156)

fun1 <- function(n = 100, k = 4, lambda = 4) {
  x <- NULL
  
  for (i in 1:n)
    x <- rbind(x, rpois(k, lambda))
  
  return(x)
}
f1 <- fun1(100, 4)
mean(f1)
f1 <- fun1(1000, 4)
f1 <- fun1(10000, 4)
f1 <- fun1(50000, 4)

fun1alt <- function(n = 100, k = 4, lambda = 4) {
  x <- matrix(rpois(n*k, lambda) , ncol = 4)
}

# Benchmarking
microbenchmark::microbenchmark(
  fun1(),
  fun1alt()
)
```
